title: Certificate (PKCS #12) (com.apple.security.pkcs12)
description: The payload that configures a PKCS #12-formatted certificate.

PayloadCertificateFileName.title: Payload Certificate Filename
PayloadCertificateFileName.description: The file name of the enclosed certificate.

AllowAllAppsAccess.title: Allow All Apps Access
AllowAllAppsAccess.description: If 'true', the system allows apps access to the private key. Available in macOS 10.10 and later.

KeyIsExtractable.title: Key is Extractable
KeyIsExtractable.description: If 'false', the system doesn't tag the private key data as extractable in the keychain.
